short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: simple video controller using keyboard for learning language with WatchaPlay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
inspired by learning language with nexflix(LLN).

supported platform is only WhatchaPlay for now.

commands

- q: reset playback rate
- w: decrease playback rate
- e: increase playback rate
- r: set start/end point for section repeat.
- t: start/stop cue repeat.
- i: show/hide other language transcripts.
- h: show/hide sidebar.
